title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4217.5 - Posting the payoff
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4217.5 - Posting the payoff

State Regulations

The payoff shall be posted after the result of the
first race is declared "official" and before the second race is run, except in
the event of a dead heat in the first race when the posting of the payoff may
be deferred until the second race has been run. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4217.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
